data.what_is: Vibetrace is a suite of e-commerce tools. It offers SaaS-based solutions for e-commerce companies to increase sales and conversion rates on their individual websites.
data.product_description: Vibetrace is a suite of e-commerce tools. It offers SaaS-based solutions for e-commerce companies to increase sales and conversion rates on their individual websites.

initial_reviews.review_title: Improves conversion rates and grows the sales funnel
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Vibetrace?
The ability to enhance the user journey, with more relevant workflows to improve conversion rates.

What do you dislike about Vibetrace?
As with any tool, it just takes time to learn how to use it effectively but I haven't found anything to dislike.

Recommendations to others considering Vibetrace:
Really helpful team, from initial discussion to supporting implementation, we've had a really positive experience.

What problems is Vibetrace solving and how is that benefiting you?
Trying to maximize every touch point to our prospect database with more personalization, and more relevant content. We feel we are serving better content and can test which content is working the best.

review_question_answers.answer: The ability to enhance the user journey, with more relevant workflows to improve conversion rates.

review_question_answers.answer: As with any tool, it just takes time to learn how to use it effectively but I haven't found anything to dislike.

review_question_answers.answer: Really helpful team, from initial discussion to supporting implementation, we've had a really positive experience.

review_question_answers.answer: Trying to maximize every touch point to our prospect database with more personalization, and more relevant content. We feel we are serving better content and can test which content is working the best.

initial_reviews.review_title: A great solution to personalize the consumer journey
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Vibetrace?
The personalized newsletter that I was able to send with Vibetrace is something that competitors couldn't easily match. Their product is probably the highest quality-to-price value out there.

What do you dislike about Vibetrace?
The UI could use an update since it's been a while since they updated it and a lot of customers might judge the book by its cover. If you're willing to see past this then the product is really high value.

What problems is Vibetrace solving and how is that benefiting you?
We were able to boost our conversion rates by using the personalization features, especially the email features to increase our open rate by 20% and re-purchase rate 10%.
